languages.text: "И ты, и твои рабы — плоды от одного сгнившего корня, потому вас так легко дурачить. Немезит и его поход против власти — просто глупая сказка для черни, которой удобно вербовать обиженных и обездоленных. На самом деле вы все должны умереть и очистить пространство для тех, кто достоин. Более чистых, набожных, смелых, чем были вы".

"Both you and your drudges come from the same rotten root. That is why you are so easy to fool. Nemesite and his march against authority are just a fancy story to tell the rabble, a convenient tool for recruiting the wronged and the dispossessed. In truth, all of you must die and make way for those who are truly worthy. More pure, more pious, more courageous than any of you ever were."
languages.original_text: "И ты, и твои рабы — плоды от одного сгнившего корня, потому вас так легко дурачить. Немезит и его поход против власти — просто глупая сказка для черни, которой удобно вербовать обиженных и обездоленных. На самом деле вы все должны умереть и очистить пространство для тех, кто достоин. Более чистых, набожных, смелых, чем были вы".

traits.locale_text: "Both you and your slaves come from the same rotten root, that's why you are so easy to fool. Nemesite and his march against authority is just a fancy story for the rabble that is convenient for recruiting the wronged and the dispossessed. In truth, you are supposed to die and make way for those who are worthy. More pure, more pious, more courageous than you are."

"Both you and your slaves come from the same rotten root, that's why you are so easy to fool. In truth, you are supposed to die and make way for those who are worthy. More pure, more pious, more courageous than you are."

Nemesite and his march against authority are just a fancy story to tell the rabble, a convenient tool for recruiting the wronged and the dispossessed. In truth, you are supposed to die and make way for those who are actually worthy. More pure, more pious, more courageous than you ever were."

Nemesite and his march against authority are just a fancy story to tell the rabble, a convenient tool for recruiting the wronged and the dispossessed. In truth, you are supposed to die and make way for those who are actually worthy. More pure, more pious, more courageous than you ever were."

"Both you and your drudges come from the same rotten root. That is why you are so easy to fool. Nemesite and his march against authority are just a fancy story to tell the rabble, a convenient tool for recruiting the wronged and the dispossessed. In truth, all of you must die and make way for those who are truly worthy. More pure, more pious, more courageous than any of you ever were."

languages.text: "Ihr und Eure Diener kommt aus derselben verfaulten Wurzel. Darum seid Ihr so leicht zu täuschen. Nemesit und sein Marsch gegen die Autorität sind nur eine schöne Geschichte für den Pöbel, ein praktisches Werkzeug zur Rekrutierung aller, die ungerecht behandelt und enteignet wurden. In Wahrheit müsst Ihr alle sterben und Platz machen für die wahrhaft Würdigen. Reiner, frommer und mutiger, als irgendjemand von Euch es jemals war."
languages.original_text: "Both you and your drudges come from the same rotten root. That is why you are so easy to fool. Nemesite and his march against authority are just a fancy story to tell the rabble, a convenient tool for recruiting the wronged and the dispossessed. In truth, all of you must die and make way for those who are truly worthy. More pure, more pious, more courageous than any of you ever were."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr und Eure Diener kommt aus derselben verfaulten Wurzel. Darum seid Ihr so leicht zu täuschen. Nemesit und sein Marsch gegen die Autorität sind nur eine schöne Geschichte für den Pöbel, ein praktisches Werkzeug zur Rekrutierung aller, die ungerecht behandelt und enteignet wurden. In Wahrheit müsst Ihr alle sterben und Platz machen für die wahrhaft Würdigen. Reiner, frommer und mutiger, als irgendjemand von Euch es jemals war."

languages.text: «Tanto tú como tus esclavos provenís de la misma raíz podrida. Por eso es tan fácil engañaros. Nemesitio y su marcha contra la autoridad no son más que historias bonitas para el populacho; una herramienta útil para reclutar a los vilipendiados y desfavorecidos. En realidad, todos vosotros debéis morir para abrir paso a quienes son verdaderamente dignos. Más puros, más devotos y más valientes de lo que ninguno de los vuestros ha sido jamás».
languages.original_text: "Both you and your drudges come from the same rotten root. That is why you are so easy to fool. Nemesite and his march against authority are just a fancy story to tell the rabble, a convenient tool for recruiting the wronged and the dispossessed. In truth, all of you must die and make way for those who are truly worthy. More pure, more pious, more courageous than any of you ever were."

traits.locale_text: «Tanto tú como tus esclavos provenís de la misma raíz podrida. Por eso es tan fácil engañaros. Nemesitio y su marcha contra la autoridad no son más que historias bonitas para el populacho; una herramienta útil para reclutar a los vilipendiados y desfavorecidos. En realidad, todos vosotros debéis morir para abrir paso a quienes son verdaderamente dignos. Más puros, más devotos y más valientes de lo que ninguno de los vuestros ha sido jamás».

languages.text: 「お前もお前の奴隷達も、同じ腐った根から生えている。だからお前たちは簡単に騙されるのだ。ネメサイトと彼の権力に対する行進は、暴徒に語るための空想の物語に過ぎず、不当な扱いを受け、土地を奪われた者を誘う便利な道具に過ぎない。本当は、お前たちが1人残らず死んで、真に相応しい者たちに道を譲らなければならない。お前達の誰よりも純粋で、敬虔で、勇敢な者達にな」
languages.original_text: "Both you and your drudges come from the same rotten root. That is why you are so easy to fool. Nemesite and his march against authority are just a fancy story to tell the rabble, a convenient tool for recruiting the wronged and the dispossessed. In truth, all of you must die and make way for those who are truly worthy. More pure, more pious, more courageous than any of you ever were."

traits.locale_text: 「お前もお前の奴隷達も、同じ腐った根から生えている。だからお前たちは簡単に騙されるのだ。ネメサイトと彼の権力に対する行進は、暴徒に語るための空想の物語に過ぎず、不当な扱いを受け、土地を奪われた者を誘う便利な道具に過ぎない。本当は、お前たちが1人残らず死んで、真に相応しい者たちに道を譲らなければならない。お前達の誰よりも純粋で、敬虔で、勇敢な者達にな」

languages.text: “无论是你，还是你那些奴隶，都源自同样的腐根。正因如此，你们才这么容易就被人愚弄。涅墨斯特和他反抗权威的故事，不过是为那些乌合之众编造出来的幻想而已。这个名字是个便利的工具，用来招募那些受苦受难的人，被剥夺财产的人。但事实上，你们所有人都必须死，这样才能为真正有价值的人开辟道路。他们比你们所有人都更加纯洁，更加虔诚，更加勇敢。”
languages.original_text: "Both you and your drudges come from the same rotten root. That is why you are so easy to fool. Nemesite and his march against authority are just a fancy story to tell the rabble, a convenient tool for recruiting the wronged and the dispossessed. In truth, all of you must die and make way for those who are truly worthy. More pure, more pious, more courageous than any of you ever were."

traits.locale_text: “无论是你，还是你那些奴隶，都源自同样的腐根。正因如此，你们才这么容易就被人愚弄。涅墨斯特和他反抗权威的故事，不过是为那些乌合之众编造出来的幻想而已。这个名字是个便利的工具，用来招募那些受苦受难的人，被剥夺财产的人。但事实上，你们所有人都必须死，这样才能为真正有价值的人开辟道路。他们比你们所有人都更加纯洁，更加虔诚，更加勇敢。”

languages.text: « Vous et vos bons à rien avez poussé de la même graine pourrie. C'est pourquoi il est si facile de vous berner. Némésite et sa marche contre l'autorité ne sont rien d'autre qu'une belle histoire pour la populace, un outil bien pratique pour recruter ceux qui s'estiment lésés et dépossédés. Mais vous devez tous mourir pour ouvrir une voie aux méritants plus purs, plus pieux et plus courageux qu'aucun de vous ne le sera jamais. »
languages.original_text: "Both you and your drudges come from the same rotten root. That is why you are so easy to fool. Nemesite and his march against authority are just a fancy story to tell the rabble, a convenient tool for recruiting the wronged and the dispossessed. In truth, all of you must die and make way for those who are truly worthy. More pure, more pious, more courageous than any of you ever were."
